strengths: Demonstrated empathy and active listening throughout the interaction
Acknowledged the customer's frustration and apologized sincerely
Provided a clear action plan with specific timeline
Maintained professional tone even when customer was upset
weaknesses: Could have asked more probing questions to understand the root cause
Missed opportunity to explain why the issue occurred
Did not verify customer contact information for follow-up
suggestions: Practice asking open-ended questions to gather more information
Always explain the cause of issues when known - it builds trust
End calls by confirming best contact method and setting follow-up expectations
Consider offering multiple solution options when possible
rawResponse: Practice asking open-ended questions to gather more information. Always explain the cause of issues when known - it builds trust. End calls by confirming best contact method and setting follow-up expectations. Consider offering multiple solution options when possible.
